snippet: A lawyer sought an injunction to prevent a CBS series about the office of the Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J. Hynes, from including anything about his client, a landlord charged after a fatal fire.
abstract: Brooklyn District Atty Charles J Hynes's decision to let his office be subject of six-art CBS News series prompts more criticism; defense lawyer Gerald L Shargel is seeking injunction to prevent CBS from broadcasting anything related to his client, landlord charged with manslaughter after Brooklyn tenement fire in 2010 that killed five Guatemalan immigrants.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer sought an injunction to prevent a CBS series about the office of the Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J. Hynes, from including anything about his client, a landlord charged after a fatal fire.

headline.seo: More Complaints About Planned TV Show on Brooklyn Prosecutor
headline.main: Lawyer Criticizes Brooklyn Prosecutor Over TV Show
headline.print_headline: Defense Lawyer Criticizes Prosecutor Over TV Show
